verbs.description: [ARG0: rural oklahoma school district] [V: approves] [ARG1: policy to arm some school employees a rural school district in pittsburg county] is taking school security into its own hands recently the pittsburg public schools board of education approved a policy to allow a handful of teachers to carry handguns while on school property school superintendent chad graham pittsburg pittsburg county oklahoma florida norman transcript pittsburg oklahoma pittsburg public schools board of education pittsburg county rural oklahoma school district okla
